original_text: And ye murmured in your tents, and said, Because the Lord hated us, he hath brought us forth out of the land of Egypt, to deliver us into the hand of the Amorites, to destroy us.
korean_text: 장막 중에서 원망하여 이르기를 여호와께서 우리를 미워하시므로 아모리 족속의 손에 넘겨 멸하시려고 우리를 애굽 땅에서 인도하여 내셨도다

sentences.original_text: And ye murmured in your tents
he hath brought us forth out of the land of Egypt
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 우리를 애굽 땅에서 인도하여 내셨다

sentences.original_text: to deliver us into the hand of the Amorites
